Gets the ott id and name of all lineages from one or more input taxa

Source: R/opentree_taxonomy.R
get_ott_lineage.Rd

Gets the ott id and name of all lineages from one or more input taxa

get_ott_lineage(input = NULL, ott_ids = NULL)

Arguments

input

Optional. A character vector of names or a datelifeQuery object
ott_ids

If not NULL, it takes this argument and ignores input. A numeric vector of ott ids obtained with rotl::taxonomy_taxon_info or rolt::tnrs_match_names or datelife::tnrs_match

Value

a list of named numeric vectors of ott ids from input and all the clades it belongs to.

Examples

taxa <- c("Homo", "Bacillus anthracis", "Apis", "Salvia")
lin <- get_ott_lineage(taxa)

#> Running 'make_datelife_query'...
#>

 get_ott_lineage(ott_id = 454749)
